dentists_access_scores:dent_e2sfca.long_name: Dental care access score (2 step-enhanced floating catchment areas)
dentists_access_scores:dent_e2sfca.short_description: Index of dental care accessibility based on supply and demand of providers
dentists_access_scores:dent_e2sfca.long_description: Dental care access score based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of dentists per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for dentists (population served by dentists). Provider address data was collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
dentists_access_scores:dent_e2sfca.statement: The dental care access score for {features.name} is {value}
